doc:
Vanessa Kirby https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vanessa_Kirby 0 Vanessa Kirby is an English stage, television and film actress. She starred as Estella in the BBC adaptation of Great Expectations in 2011 and as Joanna in Richard Curtis' romantic comedy About Time in 2013. From 2016 to 2017, Kirby portrayed Princess Margaret in Peter Morgan's Netflix series The Crown, for which she won the BAFTA Award for Best Actress in a Supporting Role in a Television Series and received a nomination for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Drama Series in 2018. She is known mostly for her stage work; Variety in 2016 called her "the outstanding stage actress of her generation, capable of the most unexpected choices". In 2018, she played White Widow in the U.S. blockbuster Mission: Impossible – Fallout. Vanessa_Kirby is an_English_stage_,_television_and_film_actress . She starred as Estella in the_BBC_adaptation of Great_Expectations in 2011 and as Joanna in Richard_Curtis '_romantic_comedy About Time in 2013 . From 2016 to 2017 , Kirby portrayed Princess_Margaret in Peter_Morgan 's_Netflix_series The_Crown , for which she won the_BAFTA_Award for_Best_Actress in a_Supporting_Role in a_Television_Series and received a_nomination for the_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actress in a_Drama_Series in 2018 . She is_known mostly for her_stage_work ; Variety in 2016 called her " the_outstanding_stage_actress of her_generation , capable of the_most_unexpected_choices " . In 2018 , she played White_Widow in the_U.S._blockbuster_Mission : Impossible – Fallout .
